data.text: I tell myself that I should praise Yahweh.
You created/caused light to be like your robe [MET].
You made/put your home in heaven, above the rain clouds in the sky, like a man puts the rafters of his house in place [MET].
You caused the winds to be like your messengers [MET],
You placed the world firmly on its foundation
Later, you covered the earth with a flood, like a blanket,
But when you rebuked the water, the oceans receded;
Mountains rose up from the water,
Then you set a boundary for the oceans, a boundary that they cannot cross;
You make/cause springs to pour water into ravines;
Those streams provide water for all the animals to drink;
Birds make their nests alongside the streams,
From ◄your home in heaven/the sky► you send rain down on the mountains,
You make/cause grass to grow for the cattle to eat,
We get grapes to make [MTY] wine to drink and make us cheerful,
Yahweh, you send plenty of rain to water your trees,
Birds make their nests in those trees;
High up in the mountains the wild goats live,
Yahweh, you made the moon to indicate the times for our festivals,
You bring darkness, and it becomes night,
At night the young lions roar as they seek their prey,
At dawn, they go back to their dens and lie down.
And during the daytime, people go to their work;
Yahweh, you have made so many different kinds of things!
We see the ocean which is very large [DOU]!
We see the ships which sail along!
All of those creatures depend on you
When you give them the food that they need,
But if you refuse to give food to them,
When you cause newborn creatures to begin to breathe,
I want the glory of Yahweh to last forever.
He causes the earth to shake just by looking at it!
I will sing to Yahweh ◄as long as I live/throughout my entire life►.
I want Yahweh to be pleased by all those things that I have thought about him,
But I desire that sinners will disappear from the earth,
